column4: Does anyone know what I have to change in xorg.conf to get it to boot X rotated in portrait mode? or point me somewhere that has instructions
not every driver supports that. If yours does, you'll find out from the man page.
I know not every driver supports on the fly rotation but I thought you could boot with it rotated with any driver, thats not so?
if it was, it would be news to me. But I'm not an X-pert as it were.
